title: A Jolly Christmas From Frank Sinatra (2015) [24-96 HD FLAC]
description:
A Jolly Christmas from Frank Sinatra was Sinatra's first full-length Christmas album, recorded May 1-July 10, 1957 at Capitol Studio A, Hollywood, LA. 


Frank Sinatra - A Jolly Christmas From Frank Sinatra
Label: Capitol Records
Format: WEB, 12 files FLAC, Album, Reissue, Remastered, Mono, 24bit 96kHz HDtracks
Released: 2015
Originally released 1957
Genre: Traditional Christmas, Vocal Jazz
